h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Dark Thunder Location
h3_title: Horse Guai The Webbed Hollow Location
content: After you kill the Centipede Guai, you can continue through a path behind it through some caves. Along this path, as the cave opens up again, you can find a coccoon. Destroy it to reveal the Horse Guai.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Dark_Thunder.md', within the main section titled 'Dark Thunder', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Dark Thunder Location' and the sub-subsection 'Horse Guai The Webbed Hollow Location'.
The content is as follows:
After you kill the Centipede Guai, you can continue through a path behind it through some caves. Along this path, as the cave opens up again, you can find a coccoon. Destroy it to reveal the Horse Guai.
